book: 1229-ARCONA Magic White Ice, Hydrate AM PM

chunk: (Apple), Allantoin (Comfrey Root), Beta Carotene (Vitamin A) (Vitamin A), Panthenol (Vitamin B-5), Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C) (Vitamin C), Tocotrienol (Vitamin E), Grapefruit Seed Extract (Citrus Grandis)
book: 1229-ARCONA Magic White Ice, Hydrate AM PM

chunk:
Directions: Apply a thin layer to dry skin in the AM. For thinner consistency, blend in palm of hand with 1-2 drops of water.

Warnings: For external use only. Avoid eye area. If contact occurs rinse eyes thoroughly. Discontinue use if signs of irritation occur. Keep out of reach of children.
book: 1229-ARCONA Magic White Ice, Hydrate AM PM
